# Stocks and Dividends
Goal: Compare the income that comes from buying/selling stocks to those from dividents

Getting the Data
```{r}
companies <- c("MSFT","GOOGL","FB","BABA")
Prices <- read_stock_prices(companies, what = "daily", start_year = 2000, end_year = 2015)
Prices %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y=close, color=company)) + geom_line()
```

Buy/Sell Profit
```{r}
Actions <- data.frame(action = c("buy","sell"), date = ymd(c("2013-01-01","2014-12-30")))

Prices %>% 
  left_join()
```
